hadiths.text: It is narrated on the authority of Abu Umama that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) observed:He who appropriated the right of a Muslim by (swearing a false) oath, Allah would make Hell-fire necessary for him and would declare Paradise forbidden for him. A person said to him: Messenger of Allah, even if it is something insignificant? He (the Holy Prophet) replied: (Yes) even if it is the twig of the arak tree

chapter.ara-name: باب وَعِيدِ مَنِ اقْتَطَعَ حَقَّ مُسْلِمٍ بِيَمِينٍ فَاجِرَةٍ بِالنَّارِ
chapter.eng-name: Warning of the Fire for the one who swears a false oath in order to unlawfully take the right of another muslim
